findings.message:
Reentrancy in MonethaBuyer.withdraw(address) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#72-111):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#89)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[user] = 0 (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#97)
	MonethaBuyer.balances (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#21) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- MonethaBuyer.balances (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#21)
	- MonethaBuyer.fallback() (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#156-165)
	- MonethaBuyer.withdraw(address) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#72-111)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
MonethaBuyer.add_to_withdraw_bounty() (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#122-127) should emit an event for: 
	- withdraw_bounty += msg.value (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#126)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
MonethaBuyer.add_to_buy_bounty() (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#114-119) should emit an event for: 
	- buy_bounty += msg.value (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#118)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
MonethaBuyer.set_addresses(address,address)._sale (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#47) lacks a zero-check on :
		- sale = _sale (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#53)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MonethaBuyer.withdraw(address) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#72-111):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#89)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contract_eth_value -= balances[user] (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#95)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MonethaBuyer.withdraw(address) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#72-111):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#89)
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(developer,fee)) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#101)
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(user,tokens_to_withdraw - fee)) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#103)
	External calls sending eth:
	- user.transfer(eth_to_withdraw) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#84)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- withdraw_bounty -= claimed_bounty (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#108)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
MonethaBuyer.claim_bounty() (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#130-153) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now < earliest_buy_time (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#134)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
MonethaBuyer.withdraw(address) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#72-111) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(bought_tokens || now > earliest_buy_time + 3600) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#74)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected require(bool)(msg.sender == developer || sha3()(password) == password_hash) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#60):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.13 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector
	- DelegateCallReturnValue
	- ECRecoverMalformedInput.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.13 (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Low level call in MonethaBuyer.claim_bounty() (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#130-153):
	- require(bool)(sale.call.value(contract_eth_value)()) (0x820b5d21d1b1125b1aad51951f6e032a07caec65.sol#150)
findings.name: low-level-calls
